member.name: IFileSyncMergeHandler.Merge
member.summary: Merges changes between the local copy and server copy of a file.
member.param: A pointer to a string containing the path to the local copy of the file.
A pointer to a string containing the network path to the server copy of the file.

param.name: updateStatus
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to one of the following values indicating status of the merge process.
Indicates that the process has completed successfully.
Indicates that additional input is required by the user for the process to complete.
Indicates that the process has failed.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileSyncMergeHandler.ShowResolveConflictUIAsync
member.summary: Displays a UI to resolve conflicts between the local copy and server copy of a file.
member.param: The path of the file with the merge conflict.
Indicates the monitor on which to display the UI.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileSyncMergeHandler
member.summary: Exposed methods to handle file sync operations between a local copy and a server copy of a file.
